snippet: Clapping supporters surround home of leader who said he was forced to resign at gunpoint.
abstract: Clapping supporters surround home of leader who said he was forced to resign at gunpoint.
lead_paragraph: New York Times correspondent Vikas Bajaj is in Male, the capital of the Maldives, where president Mohamed Nasheed recently resigned after what appeared to be a police mutiny.

headline.main: Crowds Gather for Maldives Ex-President Nasheed
